title: Data Scientist
description: A detail-oriented data scientist with expertise in machine learning, data analysis, and statistical modeling. Passionate about turning data into actionable insights.

experiences.title: Lead Data Scientist
tasks: Led data analysis projects for clients in finance, healthcare, and retail.
Developed machine learning models to predict customer behavior.
Presented findings and recommendations to executives and stakeholders.

experiences.title: Data Scientist
tasks: Analyzed large datasets to uncover trends and patterns.
Built predictive models for demand forecasting.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to improve data pipelines.

experiences.title: Data Analyst
tasks: Performed customer segmentation analysis to optimize marketing campaigns.
Created dashboards and reports to track campaign performance.
Used SQL and Python for data cleaning and analysis.

educations.degree: Master of Science in Data Science

others.title: Certifications
items: Deep Learning Specialization by Andrew Ng (Coursera)

others.title: Side Projects
items: Developed a sentiment analysis tool using NLP and Python.
Created a recommendation engine for movies using collaborative filtering.
